    • SignUp

      public static void SignUp(String fileReg, javafx.scene.control.TextField login, javafx.scene.control.Alert logRep, javafx.scene.control.TextField password, javafx.scene.control.TextField passwordCheck, javafx.stage.Stage Swindow, javafx.scene.control.Alert pass) throws IOException
      this method, depending on input parameter fileReg registers user as guest or as admin
      Parameters:
      fileReg - - name of the file in which method registers an user Firstly, checks files with listed users and if there are user with identical name as input name - throws error Then, depending on the choice of fileReg, creates new line of data in file, if choice is Guest, creates 2 files for Registered items and Bought items if choice is Admin, only writes his data in Admins.txt
      fileReg -
      login -
      logRep -
      password -
      passwordCheck -
      Swindow -
      pass -
      Throws:
      IOException
